mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category WHERE id = #{id} AND delStatus = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, code = #{code}, `name` = #{name}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category WHERE `code` = #{code} AND delStatus = 0

SELECT C.*, IFNULL(M.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer FROM category AS C LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON C.memberId = M.id WHERE 1 AND C.delStatus = 0
AND C.'name' LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND C.`code` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (C.`code` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR C.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{limitTake}

AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
